['1. Locate the remote control needed to operate the TV.', '2. Use the remote control to turn on the
 TV.'],,,,,

plaintext
def is_remote_control_needed(remote_control:item):
    # Function to check if a given item is a remote control
    symbol needed=exists television: item : is_remote_control(remote_control) and close(remote_contr
ol, television)
    return needed

behavior locate_remote_control():
    body:
        if exists remote_control: item : is_remote_control_needed(remote_control):
            # If there is already information about a remote control close to a television, no need 
to search further
            bind remote_control: item where:
                is_remote_control_needed(remote_control)
            achieve close_char(char, remote_control) 
            # Move the character closer to the confirmed remote control

        else: 
           # If no known remote control is found, initiate exploration to locate one
            foreach remote_control: item:
                if is_remote_control(remote_control) and not visited(remote_control):
                    observe(remote_control,"Verify if it is needed for the television")
                    # Observe to verify whether the remote control is needed for the television
                    
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        locate_remote_control()
